In the next year most coding bootcamps losing market share will try to switch to an ISA model. In doing so, they'll fail.

1113750269601259521.text: Just finished up what I think will end up being the best and most impactful project I've worked on so far. Launching in a few weeks.

1108732510286958592.text: The best part about the Theranos doc is it exposes the insanity of wearing the same thing every day to decrease your mental load. Fake hustle, virtue signalling for those who want it to look like they're working harder than everyone else.

1114609718746468353.text: I have a ticket to @reactamsterdam that's happening this week. If you're in Amsterdam and want it, tell someone close to you you love them and reply to this tweet. First one gets it.

1119698045816336384.text: "No one gets plumber’s block. They simply do plumbing. Creativity is work. It’s not the muse or lightning or the result of burning incense. I write daily because I’m a professional and this is what I do."

970713319454765056.text:
For the first time in over a year, I just checked the reviews for my React Fundamentals course.

2,924 responses.
9.3/10 average review.

Really proud of that. If you took it and left a review, thank you.

https://tylermcginnis.com/courses/react-fundamentals/ …pic.twitter.com/ru78e3Zhr4
